column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
N'nagali is looking at you with motherly concern.
Deliver the rotting logs to N'nagali.
<If(PlayerParameter(4))>Madame<Else/>Sir</If>, if you could hold out your hand? I have something you really must eat. Please, I insist!
Is that not the juiciest, sweetest, most invigorating thing you've ever tasted? I just finished baking a batch, and judging by your somewhat wan complexion, I thought you could use a little treat!

Oh, don't worry─I know exactly what I'm feeding you. Though I've settled here in this haven of archived cultural treasures, I was once a student of the nutritional sciences at the Faculty of Medicine.

The knowledge from that course certainly comes in useful when it comes to keeping my weary colleagues healthy and hale. ...Although I do struggle to find the time to collect all the ingredients I need.

In fact, I wonder if you'd be willing to help in that regard? I was about to head out and gather some things east of here, but if you could scour the area to the northwest for a couple of rotting logs, I'd be ever so grateful!
Yes, rotting logs! They don't need to be massive, but I will need them intact!
Yes! These should be <Emphasis>riddled</Emphasis> with the little darlings!
Thank you, both from me, and on behalf of my sure-to-be-appreciative fellow archivists! After all, no dish has more nutritional value than one made with beetle larvae!
